languages.text: {n}Ксавьер до последнего момента не замечает атаки. Хлещущая изо рта кровь расплывается алыми пятнами на обшивке грандиозной машины и не менее грандиозных планах Лорд-инквизитора, которым уже не суждено сбыться. Жестко улыбнувшись, Калькасар произносит лишь:{/n} "Неужели я повернулся к вам спиной? Теряю хватку..."

{n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксавьер до последнего момента не замечает атаки. Хлещущая изо рта кровь расплывается алыми пятнами на обшивке грандиозной машины и не менее грандиозных планах Лорд-инквизитора, которым уже не суждено сбыться. Жестко улыбнувшись, Калькасар произносит лишь:{/n} "Неужели я повернулся к вам спиной? Теряю хватку..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood pouring out of his mouth spreads in crimson spots on the grand machine's boarding and on the even-grander plans of the Lord Inquisitor that will now never come to fruition. Giving a hard smile, Calcazar only says:{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

Giving a hard smile, Calcazar only says:{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar ne remarque l'attaque que trop tard. Le sang qui jaillit de sa bouche s'étale en taches écarlates sur l'imposante machine, signant la fin prématurée des plans ambitieux du seigneur inquisiteur. Avec un sourire austère, il ne prononce que quelques mots :{/n} « Vous ai-je vraiment tourné le dos ? Je deviens négligent... »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier ne remarque l'attaque que trop tard. Le sang qui jaillit de sa bouche s'étale en taches écarlates sur l'imposante machine, signant la fin prématurée des plans ambitieux du seigneur inquisiteur. Avec un sourire austère, il ne prononce que quelques mots :{/n} « Vous ai-je vraiment tourné le dos ? Je deviens négligent... »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar no percibe el ataque hasta que es demasiado tarde. La sangre que brota de su boca se extiende en manchas carmesí por las placas de la gran máquina y por los planes aún más grandiosos del Lord Inquisidor, que ahora nunca se verán cumplidos. Logrando esbozar una sonrisa austera, solo dice:{/n} «¿De verdad le he dado la espalda? Estoy perdiendo facultades...».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier no percibe el ataque hasta que es demasiado tarde. La sangre que brota de su boca se extiende en manchas carmesí por el armazón de la gran máquina y por los planes aún más grandiosos del Lord Inquisidor, que ahora nunca se verán cumplidos. Logrando esbozar una sonrisa austera, Calcazar solo dice:{/n} «¿De verdad le he dado la espalda? Estoy perdiendo facultades...».

languages.text: {n}当卡尔卡扎留意到你的攻击时，为时已晚。鲜血从他的嘴里喷涌而出，沾在了这台巨型机器的外壳上，也沾在了大审判官宏伟的计划上。那些计划被染上了深红色的斑点，再也没有机会实现了。卡尔卡扎勉强地笑了笑，只说了这么一句话。{/n}“莫非我对你放下了戒心吗？我太草率了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

traits.locale_text: {n}当希维尔留意到你的攻击时，为时已晚。鲜血从他的嘴里喷涌而出，沾在了这台巨型机器的外壳上，也沾在了审判长更加宏伟的计划上。那些计划被染上了深红色的斑点，再也没有机会实现了。卡尔卡扎勉强地笑了笑，只说了这么一句话。{/n}“莫非我对你放下了戒心吗？我太草率了……”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar bemerkt deinen Angriff erst, als es schon zu spät ist. Das Blut, das aus seinem Mund schießt, verbreitet sich in dunkelroten Flecken auf der Verkleidung der großen Maschine und auf den ebenso großen Plänen des Großinquisitors, die nun niemals in Erfüllung gehen werden. Er ringt sich ein strenges Lächeln ab und sagt nur:{/n} "Habe ich Euch wirklich den Rücken zugekehrt? Ich werde nachlässig ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier bemerkt deinen Angriff erst, als es schon zu spät ist. Das Blut, das aus seinem Mund schießt, verbreitet sich in dunkelroten Flecken auf der Verkleidung der großen Maschine und auf den noch größeren Plänen des Großinquisitors, die nun niemals in Erfüllung gehen werden. Calcazar ringt sich ein strenges Lächeln ab und sagt nur:{/n} "Habe ich Euch wirklich den Rücken zugekehrt? Ich werde nachlässig ..."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは手遅れになるまで攻撃に気づかなかった。彼の口から噴き出した血は、巨大な機械の装甲と、今や実現することのなくなったロード・インクィジターの壮大な計画に、紅い斑点となって広がっていく。険しい笑みを浮かべながら、彼は言った。{/n}「まさかこの私がお前に背中を許すとはな。鈍ったものだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは手遅れになるまで攻撃に気づかなかった。彼の口から噴き出した血は、巨大な機械の装甲と、今や実現することのなくなったロード・インクィジターの壮大な計画に、紅い斑点となって広がっていく。険しい笑みを浮かべながら、彼は言った。{/n}「まさかこの私がお前に背中を許すとはな。鈍ったものだ…」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar saldırının farkına zamanında varamıyor. Ağzından fışkıran kan, büyük makinenin kaplamasında kızıl lekeler bırakıyor. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eşit derecede büyük planları artık asla gerçek olamayacak. Sert bir gülümsemeyle son sözlerini söylüyor.{/n} "Sana sırtımı mı döndüm? Kendimi kaybediyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar does not notice the attack until it is too late. The blood gushing out of his mouth spreads in crimson stains on the grand machine's plating and the Lord Inquisitor's equally grand plans that will now never come to fruition. Managing a stern smile, he only says,{/n} "Did I really turn my back to you? I am getting sloppy..."
